definition: functioning correctly and ready for action, a board game for two players who place counters on a grid, enter or assume a certain state or condition
details:
adjective
- functioning correctly and ready for action
= example: functioning correctly and ready for action
noun
- a board game for two players who place counters on a grid
= synonyms: go game
- a usually brief attempt
= synonyms: pass
- street names for methylenedioxymethamphetamine
= synonyms: Adam, ecstasy, disco biscuit, cristal, hug drug
- a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
= example: a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
= synonyms: turn
